generated.css: *{box-sizing:border-box;margin:0;padding:0}body{background-image:url(83d6056b08e9ddb79680a0f287abfd2d.png);margin-left:225px}.box{text-align:left;padding:10px 10px 10px 2.5%}.home{grid-area:1/1/1/1;justify-self:start}.calc{grid-area:1/4/1/4}.calc,header{text-align:center}header{padding:20px}header h1{display:block}nav{grid-area:nav}#salary{grid-area:salary}#cost{grid-area:cost}#investment{grid-area:investment}#loan{grid-area:loan}h1,h3,h4{font-family:Arial Black;color:#38383a;text-transform:uppercase;display:inline-block}h1{font-size:50px}h3{font-size:30px}table{border-collapse:collapse}.bumpTable{border-bottom:2px solid #000}.col1{width:350px}.col2{width:100px}td{height:40px;word-wrap:break-word;overflow-wrap:break-word}tr:hover{background-color:#b3b0b0}.instructions,input,label{font-size:18px;font-family:Trebuchet MS;font-weight:light}input[type=text],select{width:90px;height:30px;float:right;text-align:left}input[type=number]{line-height:30px;width:80px;text-align:center;float:right}input[type=checkbox]{width:30px;height:30px;float:right}ul input[type=checkbox]{width:20px;height:20px;align-self:center}li{margin-left:4px;margin-right:4px;margin-top:2px;padding:4px}.dynamicHeader{text-align:center;font-weight:700}#home,.dynamicHeader,h5{font-family:Trebuchet MS;font-size:22px}#home,h5{font-weight:light}#inputStatus,#output,#personB,.nameRow{display:none}.button{margin-top:5px;background-color:#555;border:none;color:#fff;padding:14px 24px;text-align:center;text-decoration:none;display:inline-block;font-size:16px;border-radius:8px}.button:hover{cursor:pointer;background-color:#fff;color:#555;border:2px solid #555;padding:12px 22px}#accountNote{display:inline-block}#calcPage{display:none;font-size:24px}#estimate,#openSpendModal{margin-top:0;font-size:12px;padding:8px 16px;margin-left:10px}#estimate:hover,#openSpendModal:hover{cursor:pointer;background-color:#fff;color:#555;border:2px solid #555;padding:6px 14px}.modal{display:none;position:fixed;z-index:1;left:0;top:0;width:100%;height:100%;overflow:auto;background-color:#000;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.4)}.spendModalContent{background-color:#fefefe;margin:15% auto;padding:10px;border:1px solid #000;width:30%}.close{color:#aaa;float:right;font-size:28px;font-weight:700}.close:focus,.close:hover{color:#000;text-decoration:none;cursor:pointer}.tooltip{position:relative;display:inline-block;color:#00f;border-bottom:1px dotted #000}.tooltip .tooltipText{visibility:hidden;width:200px;background-color:#838282;color:#fff;text-align:center;padding:5px;border-radius:6px;position:absolute;z-index:1;top:100%;left:50%;margin-left:-60px;opacity:0;transition:opacity .3s}.tooltip .tooltipText:after{content:"";position:absolute;top:100%;left:50%;margin-left:-5px;border:5px solid transparent;border-top-color:#555}.tooltip:hover .tooltipText{visibility:visible;opacity:1}.sideNav{height:100%;width:225px;position:fixed;z-index:1;top:0;left:0;background-color:#919191;overflow-x:hidden;padding-top:20px;box-shadow:2px 2px 2px 2px rgba(0,0,0,.5)}.sideNav a{padding:4px 8px 4px 16px;text-decoration:none;font-size:25px;font-family:Trebuchet MS;color:#000;display:inline-block;transition:.3s}.sideNav a:hover{color:#f1f1f1}@media screen and (max-height:450px){.sideNav{padding-top:15px}.sideNav a{font-size:18px}}
